user.title: Connect to Google Gemini
user.description: Please enter your Google Gemini API key. You can generate one from your Google AI Studio dashboard.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Google Gemini. Please check your network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API Key. Please check your key and try again.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Google Gemini account is already configured.
